document_data.name: Hu Tieh
document_data.mainbody: '''Hu Tieh''' was a [[spirit folk]] monk in [[Shou Lung]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Hu Tieh was a student of the Dragonfly style of kung fu, his spirit folk heritage helping him learn it. He was in search of a master of that martial art in order to learn the final technique.
document_data.Personality: Hu Tieh was a shy and quiet individual and often people underestimated him.
